servinfo.title: Front Brake Disc Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Hoist vehicle and remove front wheel.
Remove caliper assembly (2) by loosening caliper carrier bolts (1) (2 pcs).

attention2.ptxt: During removal, be careful not to damage brake flexible hose and not to depress brake pedal.

attention3.ptxt: Hang removed caliper with a wire hook or the like so as to prevent brake hose from bending and twisting excessively or being pulled.

s1.ptxt: Remove disc by using 8 mm bolts (1) (2 pcs).

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Front Brake Disc and Pad Inspection

s1.ptxt: Install disc to wheel hub matching hole near punch mark (1) with painted hub bolt (2).
Install caliper assembly to steering knuckle.
Tighten caliper carrier bolts (1) to specification.
Install front wheel referring to Wheel Removal and Installation .
Upon completion of installation, perform brake test.
